EmailTemplate.name: 2018_EMEAI_Connectivity_Jeddah1_KKO.2018_EMEAI_OPSCONF_PRAGUE_JAN_Irina
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Jeddah Connectivity Conference, March 15, 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION GODIRECT
CONNECTIVITY
CONFERENCE Dear customers and partners, We would like to remind you that the GoDirect Connectivity Conference <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/march/godirect-connectivity-conference-jeddah]]> will take place on March 15 in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. Meet the GoDirect team and join the dialog about latest technologies and the future of the Connected Aircraft.
REGISTER FOR FREE NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/march/godirect-connectivity-conference-jeddah]]>
Venue: Hilton Hotel, Ash Shati, Jeddah 23511 21362, Saudi Arabia
Time: 8:30 – 14:00 on March 15, 2018
WHY YOU SHOULD ATTEND
Learn about Connectivity Solutions
We will highlight Honeywell’s Connectivity solutions covering all hardware and services, including the latest upgrades, STC's, and mandates.
Find out About HAPP's Advantages
Now you can protect yourself against the burden of unexpected maintenance costs with the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP).
Get the Latest on Cyber Security
Honeywell GoDirect Cyber Protection solution will help you protect your aircraft against cyber threats.
View complete agenda <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/march/godirect-connectivity-conference-jeddah]]>
Looking forward to meeting you in Jeddah!
Tim Jensen Connectivity Sales Manager Middle East
